channel.title: Newsletter on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Newsletter on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: FO - subscribe to newsletter
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to the FO on the Homepage The FO homepage is displayed In the newsletter form field, add a email address who is not yet a newsletter subscriber email and click on “subscribe” !image-2021-04-06-16-20-27-389.png! A confirmation message is displayed !image-2021-04-06-16-19-48-272.png! Go to the BO on the module manager page Module manager page is displayed Select the “newletter” module in the list and in the select list form click on “configure”
